snippet: The comment, an owner says, was an expression of his frustration with just how complex the Affordable Care Act is and how the resulting confusion has paralyzed his company.
abstract: The comment, an owner says, was an expression of his frustration with just how complex the Affordable Care Act is and how the resulting confusion has paralyzed his company.

headline.main: A Builder Swears He'll Stay at 49 Employees to Avoid the Mandate. Unless He Grows.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
